trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised when you click on a selected control or a designer region in a selected control.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg a adatait egy <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> esemény jelenik meg, ha a kijelölt vezérlőt vagy a kijelölt vezérlőkben Tervező régiót kattint.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály nem örökölhető.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>egy esemény jelenik meg a Tervező állomás a(z) a tervezési felülethez vezérlő bizonyos műveletei.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you click a selected control or a designer region in a selected control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Például egy esemény jelenik meg, ha a kijelölt vezérlőt vagy a kijelölt vezérlőkben a tervezési felülethez a Tervező régiót kattint.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>osztály megadja az alapértelmezett meghatalmazott kezelni a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>esemény.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you click a selected control or a designer region of a selected control at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object.
trans-unit.target: Gombra a kijelölt vezérlőt vagy a kijelölt vezérlők tervező régiót tervezéskor a Tervező gazdagép inicializálja a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektum egy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>Eseménytípus, és beállítja a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs objektum tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that you clicked a designer region, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class passes the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektum azt jelzi, hogy az alapértelmezett delegált a Tervező terület kattintott a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>osztály a DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs objektumot adja át a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when you click a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: A származtatott osztályainak a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>felülbírálás osztály a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metódus a Tervező fogadó vezérlő kattintva előállított események feldolgozásához.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to, if any.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>tulajdonság jelöli a vezérlő Tervező régiót, amelyben az esemény vonatkozik, ha van ilyen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property represents the location on the design surface that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>tulajdonság adja meg a Tervező felület, amely kattintott a helyen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Események és -delegáltaknak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [NIB: események és -Delegáltaknak](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified region and location.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"> </xref> osztály az adott területen és a helyen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>delegált metódust használja a DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs konstruktor inicializálni egy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>való használatra objektum egy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektum.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: When you click a control region at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy vezérlő régiót tervezéskor gombra kattint, a Tervező gazdagép inicializálja a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektum egy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>Eseménytípus, és beállítja a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>tulajdonság egy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>objektum.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that was clicked; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: A Tervező régiót, amelyben a kattintott; a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*> inicializáló

trans-unit.source: The location that was clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.
trans-unit.target: A helyre, amely kattintott, a bal felső sarokban található az régió; viszonyítva a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*> inicializáló

trans-unit.source: Gets the location within the control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a helyet, amely kattintott a vezérlőben.

trans-unit.source: The Location property contains the coordinates that identify where you clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region.
trans-unit.target: A helyet jelölő tulajdonsághoz, amelyek azonosítják, ahol kattintott, a bal felső sarokban található régió viszonyítva koordinátáit tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: The Location property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A hely tulajdonság az inicializáláskor felvesz által a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> identifying the location within the region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> azonosítása a régiót, amelyben kattintott a helyét.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a Tervező régiót, amelyben a kattintott, ha van ilyen.

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: A régió tulajdonság jelöli a vezérlő Tervező régiót, amelyben kattintott, ha van ilyen.

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A régió tulajdonság az inicializáláskor felvesz által a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the click event applies to, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no region was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> , amelyre a click esemény vonatkozik, vagy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Ha régió kattintott.
